remarks: Closure of vector subtraction in a dual subspace.)  (Contributed by NM, 9-Mar-2015.)
statement:
ldualssvsubcl.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
ldualssvsubcl.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` D ) $.
ldualssvsubcl.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` D ) $.
ldualssvsubcl.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
ldualssvsubcl.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. S ) $.
ldualssvsubcl.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. U ) $.
ldualssvsubcl.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. U ) $.
ldualssvsubcl $p |- ( ph -> ( X .- Y ) e. U ) $.
